thread.title: Cristiano Ronaldo has said this about Barcelona stars Neymar and Lionel Messi
thread.title_full: Cristiano Ronaldo has said this about Barcelona stars Neymar and Lionel Messi

title: Cristiano Ronaldo has said this about Barcelona stars Neymar and Lionel Messi
text:
Antoine Griezmann (Atletico Madrid) â€“ repeatedly linked with Manchester United GETTY Cristiano Ronaldo reportedly rates Neymar higher than Lionel Messi GETTY Lionel Messi struggled as Barcelona lost to Deportivo yesterday 
It is said that the former Manchester United star rates Neymar higher than he does Messi. 
For weeks, Ronaldo has reportedly told team-mates that the Brazil international is close to becoming Barcelona's main man. 
The Euro 2016 winner is fearful that soon Neymar will be vying with him for the world's most prestigious individual awards. GETTY Neymar has been in stunning form for Barcelona in recent weeks 
His name is being spoken about in Madrid with players worried he could derail their bids to land both the La Liga and the Champions League. 
However, though the Barcelona star has recently hit top form, he has only scored just 14 goals from 34 games this campaign. 
Messi and Ronaldo, meanwhile, have found the net 71 times between them this season. Related articles
